statements: SELECT * FROM claims_processing;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_processing ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount AS total_payout FROM claims_processing WHERE report_generated = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY update_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, payout_amount FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount > 10000 AND payout_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC, payout_amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, payout_amount FROM claims_processing WHERE payout_amount = 0 ORDER BY claim_id
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, report_generated FROM claims_processing WHERE report_generated = TRUE ORDER BY claim_id DESC
SELECT * FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY claim_status
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT payout_id, payout_amount, payout_status FROM payouts WHERE payout_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_status='pending';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, payout_amount FROM claims JOIN payouts ON claims.claim_id = payouts.claim_id WHERE payout_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, MAX(payout_amount) AS max_payout FROM claims JOIN payouts ON claims.claim_id = payouts.claim_id GROUP BY claim_id;
SELECT * FROM claim_status;
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claim_status ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT claim_id, payout_amount, payout_date FROM claim_payout WHERE payout_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM claim_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT * FROM claim_status JOIN claim_payout ON claim_status.claim_id = claim_payout.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM claim_status WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claim_status ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM claim_reports WHERE LENGTH(report_content) > 100;
SELECT * FROM claim_payout WHERE payout_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY payout_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, SUM(payout_amount) AS total_payout FROM claim_payout GROUP BY claim_id HAVING total_payout > 10000;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_status, policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_number, claim_amount, payout_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status='approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, payout_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status='rejected' ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payouts WHERE payout_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY payout_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE policy_holder_name = 'Alice'
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT c.claim_id, c.policy_holder_name, p.payout_amount FROM claims c LEFT JOIN payouts p ON c.claim_id = p.claim_id WHERE p.payout_amount > c.claim_amount
SELECT r.report_date, r.total_claims, p.payout_amount FROM reports r JOIN payouts p ON r.total_payouts = p.payout_amount
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_status, cu.new_claim_status FROM claims c JOIN claim_updates cu ON c.claim_id = cu.claim_id WHERE cu.update_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status='pending' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status='approved' AND claim_amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount < 500 AND claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_status, p.payout_amount FROM claims c JOIN payouts p ON c.claim_id = p.claim_id;
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, c.claim_status FROM reports r JOIN claims c ON r.claim_id = c.claim_id WHERE r.report_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY r.report_date DESC;
